about_the_game:
---Game Details---

A slapstick RPG featuring three girls chasing after a hero!

Presented in retro-style pixel graphics!

At first, you will be very weak and lonely, so you should earn LVUP and funds in the field to strengthen yourself.

You can learn one skill at a time in the library, so you can use it in your adventures.

First, you will start a journey to gather companions to fight with you.

By saving and resetting frequently, you can also develop the game in your favor.

---Story---

The hero sets off on a journey at the behest of the king.

The three girls set off on an adventure to follow the hero.

Will they catch up with the hero and

find a happy ending?

---Screen Controls---

[Esc] Switches to full screen

[F1] Show/hide the top menu bar

You can adjust the key configuration and the volume of the sound/BGM.

☆Xbox controller operation

[Directional key] Character movement

[A] Open menu

[B] Various decisions

[LT] Reset game

☆Keyboard operation

[Directional key] Character movement

[X key] Open menu

[Z key] Various decisions

[R key] Reset game

---Distribution guidelines---

As long as you meet the following conditions, you are free to create game commentary and play videos, whether for personal or commercial use, with or without monetization.

・Please strictly adhere to the distribution guidelines provided by Gotcha Gotcha Games.

・Please include the URL to the Steam store page.

Please include a note that it was made using “Pixel Game Maker MV”.

If possible, please include the name “RTA Quest” in the video title or description.

We do not allow the distribution of music alone.

---Game Engine---

We are using “Pixel Game Maker MV”, which allows anyone to easily create action games, for development.

The “Tsukuru Series” is a series of games created using the action game creation software “Pixel Game Maker MV”.

content_descriptors.notes:
Characters wearing revealing clothes will appear.
There are images of female characters entering hot springs.
There is no explicit sexual content or sexual depiction.

detailed_description:
---Game Details---

A slapstick RPG featuring three girls chasing after a hero!

Presented in retro-style pixel graphics!

At first, you will be very weak and lonely, so you should earn LVUP and funds in the field to strengthen yourself.

You can learn one skill at a time in the library, so you can use it in your adventures.

First, you will start a journey to gather companions to fight with you.

By saving and resetting frequently, you can also develop the game in your favor.

---Story---

The hero sets off on a journey at the behest of the king.

The three girls set off on an adventure to follow the hero.

Will they catch up with the hero and

find a happy ending?

---Screen Controls---

Please include a note that it was made using “Pixel Game Maker MV”.

If possible, please include the name “RTA Quest” in the video title or description.

name: ツクールシリーズ　アルティエクエスト [RTA QUEST]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Additional Notes: DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: An RPG drawn in nostalgic pixel art has appeared!Three girls set out on a journey to catch up with their hero.Get your equipment in town and prepare for powerful enemies.Dreams and adventures await you!Only Japanese is supported.Other languages are not included.
